title: 2005 Ford F-350 Stake Side Truck (Not Running)
item_description:
2005 Ford F-350 Stake Side Truck (Not Running)

Specifications

  • Year: 2005
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F-350
  • VIN: 1FDWF365X5EB48921
  • License: 99283B3
    • Registration Expiration: 1/31/2023
    • Planned Non-Op
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 13,000 Lbs
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: 5.4L Triton V8
  • Body Style: Stake Side Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: P245/70R17
  • Deck Length: 114”
  • Deck Width: 92”
  • Wall Height: 24”

Exterior

  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Color: Beige
  • Features:
    • CD Player
    • Trailer Hitch
    • Air Conditioning
    • Dual Rear Wheels
  • Needs battery

Note: Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Seller purchased this item but did not transfer into their name, they have the original signed titled. The Seller sells this truck "as-is" in non running condition and with planned non-op registration; the Seller will not perform smog. The Buyer agrees to the responsibility to repair and pass smog. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both buyer/seller in an agreement to these stated terms. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, repair and smog, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
